mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT( create_time, '%d' ) date, sum( cost ) totalCost FROM cost WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT( cost.create_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( #{month}, '%Y%m' ) GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT( create_time,'%d')

SELECT type.cost_type costType, sum( cost.cost ) totalCost FROM cost cost LEFT JOIN cost_type type ON cost.cost_type = type.id WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND DATE_FORMAT( cost.create_time, '%Y%m' ) = DATE_FORMAT( #{month}, '%Y%m' ) GROUP BY cost.cost_type
